## data visualization Exercise
```{r message=FALSE}
library (dplyr)
starwars
```
### Mass Vs Weight
we will study mass vs weight relationship through scatter plot
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(starwars, aes(x=height,y=mass))+ geom_point()+ labs(title="Mass Vs Height of Starwars Characers ",x="Height",y="Mass")
```
